resources.string: Welcome to the Dictionary Search page! Here you can type in any word and browse through multiple definitions.
After you have searched the word you are thinking about, you can save the word into a list right here!
Just click on the definition you want and use the toolbar icons to save or delete the definition from your own list
Thanks for checking out our Dictionary App!
This application is design for looking up sunset or sunrise time for a specific location.
Please enter the latitude and longitude in the corresponding search bar then click "search".
You can also save or delete your favorite locations by clicking the corresponding buttons at the bottom and on the top.
By tapping an existing record, you will get the current times for date of today.
Click to perform a specific action

Recipe Search is a user-friendly mobile app that simplifies recipe discovery. Enter a recipe name, and the app, powered by the Spoonacular API, fetches a list of matching recipes. Browse results, view detailed information, save favorites to a local database, and easily access them later. The app also remembers your search term for a seamless experience.
Unfortunately, this recipe is corrupted and cannot be stored in the database
Unfortunately, this recipe is corrupted and cannot be fully displayed and stored in the database
